TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Tundra Exploration - v7.0 (Nov 5th, 2023) - (Re)Stockalike SpaceX Falcon 9, (Crew) Dragon (XL) & Haven-1!

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,  I have a question, how can I modify the amount of default fuel for the cargo rodan? because I can't find the CFG file with all the fuels.

thank you in advance

Falcon 9 v1.1 - CRS-3

Hi guys,  I have a question, how can I modify the amount of default fuel for the cargo rodan? because I can't find the CFG file with all the fuels.

Does anyone know why my plumes don't look like this? I have waterfall, and they were working pre 7.0, now my engines just look like spotlights with no plumes. Any help would be appreciated. It's immersion breaking to say the least

6 hours ago, darthgently said:

Is that the Mars Direct Shuttle?

Nah, I just took 8 Falcon 9 Cores, stuck them on a Superheavy, and put an external tank and buran on top of the superheavy. (I'm actually not sure what the mars direct shuttle is)

17 minutes ago, Ultim32 said:

Nah, I just took 8 Falcon 9 Cores, stuck them on a Superheavy, and put an external tank and buran on top of the superheavy. (I'm actually not sure what the mars direct shuttle is)

Was j/k.  Looked like it had enough DV to Buran aero braking and landing in Mars, that's all.  The Mars Direct is a reference to Zubin's plan to get to Mars more directly than current Starship plans
Oh ok. I only had enough time to get off of the ground, so I didn't get to space.

Hi guys I  have a question about the crew rodan pod and the cargo pod too, after the launch how to make it correctly (maneuvers and rendezvous) to the ISS? 

Wich engine you use?

1 hour ago, davide96 said:

Hi guys I  have a question about the crew rodan pod and the cargo pod too, after the launch how to make it correctly (maneuvers and rendezvous) to the ISS? 

Wich engine you use?

 

On 10/8/2023 at 10:01 PM, Cheesecake said:

The Super Dracos are for launch abort only. Moreover, they were once intended for landing on land and without a parachute. But this option was discarded. For attitude control, like @JebTheDestroyersaid, only the 4 Dracos at the top are used.
A total of 18 Dracos are installed for orbital manoeuvres and the 8 Super Dracos for launch abort.
